name: Voice Assistant Agent (with Telegram)
description: AI-powered voice assistant that processes voice messages through Telegram, transcribes them, and responds with intelligent answers
useCase: Create a voice-enabled chatbot on Telegram that can receive voice messages, transcribe them to text, process with AI, and send back text responses. Perfect for hands-free customer support or personal assistants.
requirements: OpenAI API key with access to Whisper and GPT models
n8n instance with internet-accessible webhook URL
author: n8n Team
features: Voice message transcription using OpenAI Whisper
Works exclusively with authorized user IDs
Handles both voice and text messages
limitations: OpenAI API costs for transcription and responses
User ID must be configured in advance

pricing.externalServices: OpenAI API (Whisper ~$0.006/minute, GPT varies by model), Telegram (free)
